summary: Completed testing of Bergeries corrections (iteration 3). All features verified: Homepage Bergeries card without description, /bergeries page with two cards, Dashboard dropdown shows 'Bergeries', Gestion Accès labels updated, Cities API no duplicates, Session persistence working.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Bergeries corrections verified. Key changes: 1) Homepage Bergeries card has no description/subtitle, 2) /bergeries page shows two cards 'Bergerie' and 'Bergerie (ex Groupes de Disciples)', 3) Dashboard dropdown shows 'Bergeries' instead of 'Promotions', 4) Gestion Accès shows 'Superviseur Bergeries' and 'Responsable Bergerie' labels, 5) Cities API returns 11 unique cities with no duplicates, 6) Login superadmin works and session persists across navigation.

features_verified: Homepage Bergeries card shows only title 'Bergeries' with NO description
